text: Skazhi veruyushchim (o prorok!): "Yesli vy lyubite vashikh ottsov, synovey, brat'yev, suprug, rodstvennikov i imushchestvo, kotoroye vy priobreli, i torgovlyu, zastoya v kotoroy vy boites', i zhilishcha, v kotorykh vam khorosho zhit', sil'neye, chem lyubite Allakha, Yego poslannika i svyashchennuyu bor'bu za veru Allakha, - lyubite nastol'ko bol'she, chto otvleklis' ot podderzhki poslannika, togda zhdite, poka ne ispolnitsya volya Allakha i Yego nakazaniye dlya vas. Allakh ne nastavlyayet na pryamoy put' greshnikov, kotoryye narushayut zakony Yego religii
